channel.title: "Islevel" Command
channel.description:
[u][b]Editing Your Combat Level In Game[/b][/u] (Temp/Changes Back To Level 126 After Logout.)
Source I Used: AllStar (EASY) Difficulty: Easy Requirments: A Source(Mainly Just Client.Java) Link To Original Post: http://silver.smfforfree3.com/index.php/topic,4.0.html
[u]1ST:[/u] -Open Client.Java -Search(Cntrl+F) and enter [i]HOME"[/i] or [i]PICKUP"[/i] ...Something Like That
[u]2ND:[/u] Then look for the final bracket (}), then past the following code below it.
[u][b]CODE:[/b][/u] if(command.startsWith("islevel") && playerRights > 3) { int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8)); extraCb += combat; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
[b]Then Save and Compile** Then Just Run Your Server! :D[/b]
EXAMPLE WHEN DONE: (In Text, Not Picture) HaHa Sorry. ________________________________________ | Welcome to SilverScape! | | Enjoy All The Fun! | | | | You Have Chaned Your Level! | |________________________________________| |Silver: ::islevel 1 | |________________________________________|

item.title: "Islevel" Command
item.dc:creator: @theyungbubba theyungbubba
item.description:
@theyungbubba wrote:

Editing Your Combat Level In Game (Temp/Changes Back To Level 126 After Logout.)

Source I Used: AllStar (EASY)
Difficulty: Easy
Requirments: A Source(Mainly Just Client.Java)
Link To Original Post: http://silver.smfforfree3.com/index.php/topic,4.0.html

1ST:
-Open Client.Java
-Search(Cntrl+F) and enter HOME" or PICKUP" …Something Like That

2ND:
Then look for the final bracket (}), then past the following code below it.

CODE:
if(command.startsWith(“islevel”) && playerRights > 3)
{
int combat = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(8));
extraCb += combat;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}

Then Save and Compile**
Then Just Run Your Server!

EXAMPLE WHEN DONE: (In Text, Not Picture) HaHa Sorry.

| Welcome to SilverScape! |
| Enjoy All The Fun! |
| |
| You Have Chaned Your Level! |
||
|Silver: ::islevel 1 |
||

Read full topic
